name: French Empire
startIntroPart1: Long life and triumph to you, First Consul and Emperor of France, Napoleon I, ruler of the French people. France lies at the heart of Europe. Long has Paris been the world center of culture, arts and letters. Although surrounded by competitors - and often enemies - France has endured as a great nation. Its armies have marched triumphantly into battle from one end of the world to the other, its soldiers and generals among the best in history.
startIntroPart2: Napoleon Bonaparte, France yearns for you to rebuild your empire, to lead her once more to glory and greatness, to make France once more the epicenter of culture and refinement. Emperor, will you ride once more against your foes? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: I have made all the calculations; fate will do the rest.
attacked: The bullet that will kill me is not yet cast.
introduction: I am Napoleon, and I am here to decide the fate of the world.
neutralHello: The Empire endures. For now, so do you.
uniques: Earn [50]% of killed [Military] unit's [Strength] as [Culture]
[+15]% Strength <for [{Land}] units> <when adjacent to a [{Friendly} {Land}] units>
[+1] Movement <for [{Land}] units> <when adjacent to a [{Friendly} {Land}] units>

name: Great Britain
startIntroPart1: King George III, sovereign of the British Empire and ruler of the seas, your fleets dominate the waves.
startIntroPart2: Will Britannia continue to rule or be cast down from its lofty perch?
declaringWar: Britain shall not bow to tyranny!
attacked: The empire answers with cannon and courage.
introduction: I am George III, King of Great Britain and Ireland. May our dealings be civil—and brief.
hateHello: Your presence is an insult to Britain.
uniques: +1 [Gold] from sea tiles
Naval units gain +1 movement and +10% [Combat Strength]
Colonial cities (on other continents) generate +25% [Production]

name: Austrian Empire
startIntroPart1: Emperor Francis II, last Holy Roman Emperor and ruler of Austria, your empire stands at the heart of Europe.
startIntroPart2: Will you preserve the old order or give way to revolution?
attacked: The Empire will not crumble quietly.
introduction: I am Francis II, Emperor of Austria and defender of tradition. Speak, if you value peace.
neutralHello: Austria listens but does not trust easily.
hateHello: You threaten the stability of Europe.
uniques: +15% [Production] when building [Wonders]
Allied [City-States] provide +25% more [Influence] per turn
Units start with the [Drill I] promotion

name: Kingdom of Prussia
startIntroPart1: King Frederick William III, ruler of Prussia and reformer of the army, your kingdom stands as Europe's rising sword.
startIntroPart2: Can you transform defeat into destiny and lead Prusia to greatness?
declaringWar: Prussia shall bring order through steel!
introduction: I am Frederick William III of Prussia. Speak quickly, and with purpose.
uniques: All melee units train 25% faster
Units gain +10 XP when adjacent to a [General]
Barracks and Armories provide +1 [Science]

name: Russian Empire
startIntroPart1: Tsar Alexander I, sovereign of the vast Russian Empire, your armies endure where others falter.
startIntroPart2: Will you defend your realm or strike at the heart of Europe?
attacked: The snows will be your grave!
introduction: I am Alexander, Emperor of All Russia. Let us speak with civility, if not trust.
hateHello: We have no more patience for you.
uniques: Units in friendly territory heal +25 HP per turn during [Winter] (cold biomes)
Snow and Tundra tiles yield +1 [Production] and +1 [Faith]
Mounted units gain +15% [Combat Strength] in open terrain

name: Ottoman Empire
startIntroPart1: Sultan Selim III, reformer of the Ottoman Empire, your lands stretch across continents.
startIntroPart2: Will you restore glory through modernization or fall to encroaching powers?
declaringWar: The Sultan's justice shall be swift!
attacked: You defy the Padishah? So be it!
introduction: I am Selim, Sultan of the Ottomans. Let us not waste words.
hateHello: You dare show your face again?
uniques: Barracks provide +1 [Science] and +1 [Happiness]
All land units cost 10% less [Production] to train
Trade routes generate +1 [Gold] for every different religion in the destination city

name: Kingdom of Spain
startIntroPart1: King Charles IV, ruler of a once-mighty empire, Spain looks to you to reclaim its glory.
startIntroPart2: Can you restore order amid chaos and resist the tide of revolution?
declaringWar: Spain shall not bend to threats!
attacked: We fight for God and Crown!
defeated: I... was never meant to rule...
introduction: I am Charles of Bourbon, King of Spain. Speak, if your cause is just.
hateHello: We have endured your insults long enough.
tradeRequest: What does your empire bring to our court?
uniques: Enemy units suffer -10% [Combat Strength] in Spanish territory
Recon units gain +1 Sight and may enter enemy territory without open borders
Units receive +15% [Combat Strength] when adjacent to another friendly unit
